net.algem.util.event

Class GemEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • net.algem.util.event.GemEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CancelEvent, ContactSelectEvent, CourseEvent, CreatePostitEvent, EnrolmentEvent, GroupCreateEvent, GroupDeleteEvent, GroupUpdateEvent, InstrumentCreateEvent, InstrumentDeleteEvent, InstrumentUpdateEvent, InvoiceEvent, InvoiceItemCreateEvent, ItemDeleteEvent, ItemUpdateEvent, MessageEvent, ModifPlanEvent, ModuleEvent, MusicStyleEvent, MusicStyleUpdateEvent, NoteEvent, QuoteEvent, RehearsalEvent, RoomCreateEvent, RoomDeleteEvent, RoomUpdateEvent, ScheduleDetailEvent, SelectDateEvent, TeacherEvent, TeacherUpdateEvent

    public class GemEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    Gem event object. Basic event handler utility.
